## Generator\_2.blockToCode() method

Generate code for the specified block (and attached blocks). The generator must be initialized before calling this function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
blockToCode(block: Block | null, opt_thisOnly?: boolean): string | any[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) \| null | The block to generate code for. |
|  opt\_thisOnly | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True to generate code for only this statement.  For statement blocks, the generated code. For value blocks, an array containing the generated code and an operator order value. Returns '' if block is null. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| any\[\]
